<h3 id="X39879">X(39879) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ARA TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^10-(b^2+c^2)*a^8-2*(b^4+8*b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^6+2*(b^2+c^2)*(b^4+4*b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^4+(b^4-c^4)^2*a^2-(-4*b^2*c^2+(b^2-c^2)^2)*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39879) = 3*X(3)-4*X(15577) = 9*X(3)-8*X(15578) = 11*X(3)-8*X(15579) = 3*X(3)-8*X(15580) = X(3)-4*X(15581) = 5*X(3)-8*X(15582) = 7*X(3)-8*X(35228) = 3*X(159)-2*X(15577) = 9*X(159)-4*X(15578) = 11*X(159)-4*X(15579) = 3*X(159)-4*X(15580) = 5*X(159)-4*X(15582) = 7*X(159)-4*X(35228) = 3*X(15577)-2*X(15578) = 11*X(15577)-6*X(15579) = X(15577)-3*X(15581) = 5*X(15577)-6*X(15582) = 7*X(15577)-6*X(35228) = 11*X(15578)-9*X(15579) = X(15578)-3*X(15580) = 2*X(15578)-9*X(15581) = 5*X(15578)-9*X(15582) = 7*X(15578)-9*X(35228)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39879) lies on these lines: {3,66}, {4,19459}, {5,36851}, {6,1598}, {22,5921}, {24,39874}, {25,6776}, {26,35219}, {64,3098}, {68,10243}, {69,11414}, {154,182}, {161,542}, {197,39877}, {206,5050}, {389,7716}, {394,34750}, {427,38396}, {511,1498}, {575,19132}, {611,26888}, {613,10535}, {1181,1843}, {1350,6000}, {1351,2393}, {1353,7530}, {1482,3827}, {1597,18400}, {1614,19125}, {1656,23300}, {1660,8780}, {1853,16419}, {1971,34809}, {2777,2930}, {2781,12308}, {2854,9934}, {2883,31670}, {2935,12584}, {3089,18935}, {3357,31884}, {3517,20987}, {3519,9920}, {3564,5596}, {3589,11484}, {3763,20299}, {3818,11479}, {3843,18382}, {5055,20300}, {5085,10282}, {5092,17821}, {5093,34117}, {5097,17813}, {5102,34788}, {5198,14853}, {5480,18535}, {5594,39888}, {5595,39887}, {5663,38885}, {5800,7497}, {5847,9911}, {5848,9913}, {5878,29181}, {5895,29317}, {6403,11456}, {6467,26883}, {6617,15595}, {7393,18358}, {7484,32064}, {7517,39899}, {8185,39878}, {8190,39880}, {8191,39881}, {8192,39898}, {8193,39885}, {8194,39895}, {8195,39896}, {9714,22550}, {9818,39884}, {9822,37514}, {9919,32254}, {9967,18451}, {9969,11432}, {10037,39900}, {10046,39901}, {10323,20079}, {10516,18381}, {10519,12324}, {10533,13889}, {10534,13943}, {10594,14912}, {10602,12283}, {10606,14810}, {10752,32240}, {10790,39872}, {10828,39882}, {10829,39889}, {10830,39890}, {10831,39891}, {10832,39892}, {10833,39897}, {10834,39902}, {10835,39903}, {11284,35260}, {11365,39870}, {11441,12220}, {11477,34779}, {11574,17814}, {11576,12167}, {11579,15647}, {11853,39886}, {11898,12083}, {12017,23041}, {12087,20080}, {12121,36201}, {12166,31305}, {12315,18436}, {13093,34778}, {13289,16010}, {13347,17822}, {14561,15583}, {14927,21312}, {15069,37485}, {15141,19377}, {17845,29012}, {18954,39873}, {19005,39875}, {19006,39876}, {19124,19357}, {19457,32250}, {22654,39883}, {35776,39893}, {35777,39894}</p>
<p>
X(39879) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {69, 34781}, {1498, 9924}, {9919, 32254}, {12315, 33878}, {19588, 39568}<br>
X(39879) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3, 159), (6, 6759), (64, 3098), (159, 15581), (1351, 19149), (2935, 12584), (6247, 15585), (8549, 206), (11477, 34779), (11579, 15647), (13093, 34778), (14216, 141), (15577, 15580), (15583, 16252), (16010, 13289), (31670, 2883), (33878, 34787), (34777, 34117), (34780, 66), (36851, 5), (37491, 7387)<br>
X(39879) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (161, 1619, 9909), (206, 8549, 5050), (1351, 32063, 19149), (1614, 39588, 19125), (5050, 14530, 206), (15577, 15580, 159), (15577, 15581, 15580), (15583, 16252, 14561), (34117, 34777, 5093)<br>
</p>
